page.title: 12A day with the Taylor family
page.content: L. collected the girls from school at 15.15. J. watched a video film and A. played on her bike while L. made the tea of sausages, new potatoes, peas and sweetcorn. After tea (18.00) the girls played outside while L. washed the pots, brought in the washing, and watched television. At 19.45, G. returned. L. made his tea (as above). At 20.00 the girls came in, watched tv, undressed, washed, brushed hair, had cake and coffee and went to bed at 21.00 after kissing mum and dad. G. and L. had some coffee, watched tv and talked about the new house before going to bed at midnight.
